description.en: (1) Lattice structure (2) Liquid phase epitaxy(3) Vapor phase epitaxy (4) Matel-organic chemical vapor deposition (5) Molecular beam epitaxy (6) measuring technology of epilayer

name.zh: 科技產業趨勢分析專案研究
name.en: Project Research of Industry Trend Analysis in High Technolo

description.zh: 1.運用Crystal Cycle 景氣週期循環訊息2.採用Porter五力分析、SWOT分析、與鑽石分析之研究工具探究相關產業的內容與現況3.	相關產業趨勢專案製作4.相關產業趨勢專案之實驗與評鑑
description.en: 1. It applies the circulate message of prosperity cycle on Crystal Cycle. 2. It explores contents and situations about relating property by Porter's five force analysis, SWOT analysis, and Diamond analysis.3. It manufactures the Project in relating property.4. It practices and criticizes the Project in relating property.

name.en: Special topics on liquid crystal display(II)

description.zh: 延續'液晶專題(I)'之課程, 1. 液晶材料及其光電特性2. 液晶顯示器的顯示模式3. 液晶元件之應用與發展
description.en: 1.liquid crystal material and their electrooptical characteristics 2.liquid crystal displays 3. development and application of the liquid crystal displays

description.zh: 本課程主要提供學生在生物化學上幾個選擇性主題較深的知識。包括:蛋白質結構和功能、蛋白質輸送、蛋白質分解、接受器、生物膜、生物代謝和基因調控、人類疾病的生物化學及分子生物和生物技術。
description.en: This course provides students with a depth of knowledge of a number of selected topics in biochemistry. It Including of protein structure and function; protein transport; protein degradation; receptors; biological membranes; bioenergetics including photosynthesis; metabolic and genetic regulation;; biochemistry of human diseases and the techniques that underpin the developments of molecular biology and biotechnology.

description.zh: 邀請校內外學者專家至校針對某一專長領域進行專題演講，讓學生藉由聽講及心得報告之寫作，開展視野，並與時代之脈動相契合。
description.en: Invited speakers from different disciplines give speech in their specialized area. Thus students can broaden their eyesight and also keep updating the technology and its applications of the generation.

description.zh: 分子生物學為現代生物科技尤其是基因工程的基礎學問。課程內容深入探討生物的四大類分子： DNA 及 RNA，蛋白質，脂質，以及醣類分子。並且詳細探討現代分子生物學之中心思想，包含DNA 複製、轉錄、轉譯等。
description.en: Molecular biology is the fundamental of modern biotechnology, especially genetic engineering. Students learn what are DNA, RNA, protein, lipid, and carbohydrate and how do they work in this course. The central dogma of modern molecular biology, including DNA replication, transcription, and translation, is the major topic of this course.

description.zh: 本課程提供學生們一個可以改善他們的科技英文寫作技巧的環境，內容將包括：1. 扼要複習英文句型與文法，2. 撰寫論文常發生的錯誤，3. 分享論文審稿的經驗，4. 提供淺顯實用的寫作原則，5. 同儕分享讀論文與寫作的錯誤心得。
description.en: This course provides an environment to help students improving their English skill in writing technical paper or thesis. What will be included in the class are: 1. concise review of sentence structure and grammar, 2. frequent writing mistakes of paper or report, 3. share of the experience in paper review, 4. offering simple and practical writing principles, 5. share the experience in reading and writing papers.

description.zh: 由於經濟活動的急遽擴張，大量生產、大量消費的生活型態，產生大量廢棄物，導致環境負擔超過涵容及復原能力，加上台灣地狹人稠，自然資源不豐，造成環境品質惡化及發展遲滯危機，因此，如何突破天然資源限制，開創永續發展動能，以建設舒適美好生活環境，實為當前重要課題。本課程分別從污染防治、生化程序控制、材料製程應用及災害防治等工程技術觀點著手，培養具永續發展之經營管理智能。
description.en: Because of fast economic development of the modern society, our environment has been deteriorated due to the massive waste production from these economic activities.  Therefore, how to recover and provide the best environment from engineering point of view is a very critical issue.  This course will provide specific knowledge base to these advanced students from pollution control, chemical process, disaster prevention and material engineering points of view in order to minimize waste production before, during and after the production process.

description.zh: 分別從科學哲學層次、研究方法層次、與實際操作層次探討設計研究的本質，內容包括界定設計研究問題、選用適當的量化研究方法與特定工具、研究結果詮釋、案例解析、以及論文寫作等。
description.en: This course is to explore the nature of design research at the three various levels of scientific philosophy, research methods, and best practices. The contents involve the introduction of defining the design problems, selecting the quantitative research methods and specific apparatus, interpretation of research results, case studies, as well as academic writing.

description.zh: 設計相關專題，以文獻研讀，邀請專家專題演講，及論文討論為重點，參與者透過密集討論、書面報告、或舉行設計發表等方式，可以有效率地交換意見，獲得更深入而廣泛的體驗。
description.en: Topical studies in history, theory, and criticism of design. Under the above goals, inviting addresses for special topics will be arranged though the courses. The Participants are encouraged to have intensive discussion, written reports, or further design presentation. Efficient experience exchange would be also expected to derive more extensive interest.

description.zh: 藉由國內外設計競賽主題與產學合作設計案進行實際演練，著重於資料蒐集、商品分析、創新構想與成果表達之進階能力養成，期讓學生在國內外設計競賽舞台上展現光芒，在產學合作中習得實務經驗並獲致產業界肯定。因此本課程旨在以實際演練達成兼具創新性與商品化專業設計能力養成。
description.en: Advanced Design (I) educates students to identify and resolve design problems - innovatively and with sensitivity to the social, physical and ecological environment.  Students learn to analyze and solve diverse design problems from technical, aesthetic, social and ecological viewpoints. Students are given the resources to identify, expand and test personal and professional development through an intensive exploration of design ideas.  Innovation is stressed, along with the ability to refine formal design issues.  There are numerous opportunities for students to work with industry through corporate-sponsored studio projects and design competitions.

description.zh: 邀請校內外學者專家至校針對某一專長領域進行專題演講，讓學生藉由聽講及心得報告之寫作，開展視野，並與時代之脈動相契合。
description.en: Invited speakers from different disciplines give speech in their specialized area. Thus students can broaden their eyesight and also keep updating the technology and its applications of the generation.

description.zh: 本課程說明如何利用質量及動量守恆建立可以描述速度、應力及壓力等流體系統物理量間關係之統制方程式。其內容包括：線及角動量守衡、應力張量、平滑近似理論、非穩態流動、邊界層近似法、線性穩定度理論及紊流系統。
description.en: We will learn how fundamental principles such as conservation of mass and momentum lead to equations that govern or describe the interrelationships of velocity, stress, pressure, and so on. Content includes macroscopic balance for linear and angular momentum, the stress tensor, lubrication approximation, unsteady flow、the boundary layer approximation, linear stability theory, and turbulent flows.

description.zh: 基本熱傳機構，穩態與非穩態熱傳導其包括有內部熱源之系統。內部及外部之強制及自然對流。表面及氣體間之輻射。利用因次方法及邊界層來考量熱傳。
description.en: Basic heat transfers mechanisms. Steady and unsteady conduction, including system with internal heat sources. Internal and external forced and free convection. Radiation between surfaces and in gases. Dimensional and boundary layer consideration.

description.zh: 本課程內容包括以分子熱力學的觀點來推導狀態方程式與活性係數模式，及有關相平衡的應用，統計熱力學原理亦將一併介紹。
description.en: The contents of this course include deriving the equation of state and the activity coefficient model based on the viewpoint of molecular thermodynamics and its application in phase equilibrium, and the principles of statistical thermodynamics will be also introduced.

description.zh: 本課程之主要目的是介紹生物程序之必需知識給傳統化學工程，假定他們未具生物學的背。生物程序是應用工程原理，來設計，發展以及採用生物催化劑來解析程序。這些程序可得很多結果，諸如生產期望化合物或分解破壞不要的有害的物質。工程的工具，尤其化學工程將會成功拓展生物程序所必須。
description.en: The main purpose of this course is to introduce the essential knowledges of bioprocessing to traditional chemical engineers. No background in biology is assumed. Biopocess engineering is the application of engineering principles to design, develop, and analyze process using biocatalysts. These processes may result in the production of desirable compounds or in the destruction of unwanted or hazardous substances. The touls of the engineer, particularly the chemical engineer will be essential to the successful exploitation of bioprocesses.

description.zh: 本課程旨在教導學生瞭解各類化工程序模式的建立以及其求解的方法。內容包括：輸送動態方程式之建立，線性、非線性、矩陣、微分方程等之轉換及求解。
description.en: The goal of process simulation is to develop numerical analysis techniques that allow students to simulate the behavior of a chemical process. The contents involving：the development of dynamic equations of transport, the transformations and solutions of linear, nonlinear matrix, and differential equations.

description.zh: 本課程介紹高分子結構與其特性之關係，內容包括分子量、分子組成及結構、溶液特性、相變化、自組裝性質、彈性行為、粘彈性、動態機械性質、光學、電學和光電特性。
description.en: This course is an introduction to the relationship between polymer structure and properties: focusing on the molecular conformation and configuration, solution and phase behavior, rubber elasticity, viscoelasticity, dynamic mechanical behavior, optic, electronic and optoelectronic properties.

description.zh: 本課程之目標為增進研究生之英文閱讀能力與寫作技巧，介紹英文科技論文的慣用語法、用字與閱讀技巧及分析撰寫英文報告與學術論文之章法與組織要領。
description.en: The object of this course is to improve reading ability and writing skill for graduate students. This course introduces grammar, terms and phrases that are frequently used in English technical articles. Structures of English essay and thesis will also be explained.

description.zh: 本課程主要探討下列音訊編碼技術：MP-3,Dolby AC-3及DTS。課程內容涵蓋下列項目:1.複習數位訊號處理 2.CD片聲音還原 3.多相位分解 4.次頻段音訊編碼5.個案研究:MP-3,MPEG-2 AAC,AC-3及DTS 6.MPEG-4合成音樂簡介
description.en: 1.This course mainly discusses various audio coding schemes such as MP-3,Dolby AC-3,and DTS.Topics covered in the course include:1.Review of digital signal processing 2.Audio reproduction from CD3.Polyphase decomposition4.Subband coding of audio signals5.Psychoacoustic models6.Case studies:MP-3,MPEG-2 AAC, AC-3,and DTS7.Introduction to Synthetic audio in MPEG-4

notes: 上課教室綜科館208英文授課

description.zh: 1.數位影像處理的基礎 2.影像的轉換 3.影像的加強 4.影像的復原 5.彩色影像的處理6.影像的壓縮 7.影像的分割與特徵抽取 8.影像的表達及描述 9.影像的辨認與解釋10.導航與醫學影像
description.en: 1.Digital image fundamentals 2.Image transforms. 3.Image enhancement 4. Image restoration 5. Color image processing. 6. Image compression. 7. Image segmentation and feature detection 8. Representation and desciption 9. Recogmition and interpretation  10. Applications: ALV navigation and medical image.

description.zh: 嵌入式系統目前愈來愈普遍。它將會大大地影響我們的生活方式。可攜式裝置如智慧型手機、掌上型電腦、以及所謂的IA裝置如家用網路閘道器、數位視訊錄影機、和常見的遊戲機都是屬於嵌入式系統的範疇。	在本課程中,我們將會討論何謂嵌入式系統、嵌入式系統的形式、以及如何建構一個嵌入式系統。由於嵌入式系統包含硬體及軟體的議題，我們也會探討相關的主題。	本課程的先修課程包含計算機組織與結構、C程式語言、資料結構、系統程式、以及作業系統。課程主要內容如下： 	嵌入式系統簡介與概論 	嵌入式精簡指令集結構 	ARM指令集 	嵌入式計算平台 	嵌入式程式設計與分析 	嵌入式作業系統 	系統設計技術 	裝置操作 	網路本課程亦包含實習與學期專題作業。
description.en: Embedded systems are more and more popular today. It will affect the human life greatly. Portable devices like smart phone, PDA, and MP3 player, and so-called IA devices such as home gateway, DVR, and game machine are all categorized as embedded systems.	In this course, we will discuss what an embedded system is, what it looks like, and how to build an embedded device. Since an embedded system involves hardware and software issues, we will discuss the related subjects. 	The prerequisite courses for this class include computer organization and architecture, the C programming language, data structure, system programming, and operating system. The major topics of this course are listed as follows: 	Introduction and Basic Concepts 	The RISC Embedded Architectures 	The ARM instruction Set 	The Embedded Computing Platforms 	Program Design and Analysis 	The Embedded Operating Systems 	System Design Techniques 	Device Manipulation 	NetworksExperimental laboratories and

description.zh: 1.軟體架構總覽 2.Client-server式架構 3.Model-view-controller式架構 4.n層式架構 5.Peer-to-peer式架構 6.式樣導向式架構 7.Pipes and filter 式架構特論
description.en: 1.Software architecture-overview 2.Client-Server 3.Model-view-controller 4.n-Tier design 5.Peer-to-peer 6.Pattern-oriented software architecture 7.Special Topics:pipes and filter

notes: 碩、博及軟體工程學程合開上課教室綜科館208

description.zh: 本課程旨在介紹學生軟體工程的概念與技術。學生將學習開發高品質軟體相關的原理、觀念、方法、與技術。本課程將介紹下列主題：一、軟體工程簡介二、軟體流程模型三、需求工程四、軟體設計方法五、物件導向軟體開發六、軟體測試與驗證七、軟體品質確保八、軟體維護九、軟體專案管理與規劃十、軟體工程進階主題
description.en: The objective of this course is to provide students with a full awareness of the knowledge and technologies of software engineering. In particular, students will learn about the practices, concepts, methods, and techniques for producing high quality software. The course will cover the following topics: 1.An Overview of Software Engineering2.Software Process Models3.Requirements Engineering4.Software Design Methods5.Object-Oriented Software Development6.Software Testing Strategy and Tactics7.Software Quality Assurance8.Software Maintenance9.Software Project Management and Planning10.Advanced Topics in Software Engineering

notes: 碩、博及軟體工程學程合開上課教室綜科館208

name.zh: 行動網際網路應用系統設計

description.zh: 透過原理解說與系統實作，使學生熟悉在Mobile Internet架構下，開發行動通訊應用系統所需之各項整合技術。課程內容包括： 1. 行動通訊應用設計概觀  2. J2ME應用程式開發  3. 無線網路傳輸應用設計  4. 行動資料庫應用設計  5. 開放式服務閘道協議  6. 嵌入式行動訊息設備開發環境  7. 遠端應用程式儲存庫設計  8. 遠端服務管理技術  9. 嵌入式訊息佇列技術  10. 無線射頻識別技術  11. 期末專題設計
description.en: To provide students with the knowledge and skills to develop mobile Internet application systems.  This course covers the technical foundations of the mobile Internet technology as well as the practice of application system development through readings, lectures, and class projects.  Course topics include:  1. Course Overview  2. J2ME Programming  3. The Connected Limited Device Configuration  4. Pervasive Database  5. Open Service Gateway Initiative  6. Embedded Message Gateway Environments  7. Bundle Repository  8. Remote Service Management Frameworks  9. Embedded Message Queue  10. RFID Technology  11. Final Project

description.zh: 認識英文學術論文的語法、文體、結構組織等特質，並探討英文報告及論文撰寫方式。
description.en: This course helps the learners recognize the syntax, style, and organization as far as the papers on English writings are concerned.

notes: 博士班上課教室綜科館208

description.zh: 介紹與醫學相關之醣類生物學
description.en: The course is designed to teach graduate students about the recent advances in glycobiology with medical and biotechnological applications. The prerequisite for the course is general biochemistry. Students are expected to learn the structure, biosynthesis, chemistry and cell biology in related to bioactive glycans.

description.zh: A.質點運動:1.位置,速度和加速度2.直線運動 3.曲線運動 4.軌道運動 5.相對運動 B.質點運動力學:1.牛頓運動定律 2.慣性參考構架 3.質量中心的運動方程式.C. 能量法:功與動能:1.功與功率;位能 3.保守力 4.保守能 D.動量法:1.動量與衡量原則 2.保守線性動量 3.衝擊力 4.角動量 5.質量流
description.en: (A)Dynamics of a particles:(1)Kinematics of a particles:rectilinear coordinates, tangential and normal coordinates,polar coordinates.(2)Kinetics of a particles:force and acceleration, work and energy,impulse and momentum.(B)Dynamics of a rigid bodies (1)Kinematics of rigid bodies:translation and rotation,relative motion,instaneous zero velocity center.(2)Kinetics of rigid bodies:force and acceleration, work and energy, impulse and momentum.

description.zh: 給水系統的設計旨在充分供應計劃人口與計劃年限之計劃用水量，主要討論單元有：取水工程、輸水工程（動力管及壓力管之設計）、淨水工程（沈澱、混凝膠凝、過濾及消毒等）、配水工程（面積法、累積曲線法及經驗法等配水池設計方法、及各種配水管網之型式設計）等四大單元之設計，經由充份的習題演算，使學者熟悉給水系統設計方法。
description.en: To promote the knowledge of principle for students,the course ,Waste Treatment and Disposal,focuses on middle treatment and final disposal of waste. Contents of the course include:Definition and classification of waste.Storage and transportation,Incineration,Fixation,Landfill and Overall planning of treatmrnt plant.

name.en: Operation and Maintenance of Water Plant

description.zh: 水處理廠操作與維護課程包括給水工程及污水工程設施之操作與維護,本課程為傳統衛生工程設施最主要之部份,內容涵蓋物理單元化學單元以及生物單元之操作維護,主要之設施包括前處理,混凝,沈澱,過濾,消毒,活性污泥,旋轉生物盤,接觸曝氣法以及污泥處理,處置單元之操作維護.
description.en: Water supply Engineering includes the system from water sources, intake, conveyor, purification and distribution. Water source will discuss about the intakes and resource conservation. Conveyor will have topics about layout, pumping and piping. Water treatment flow sheet is most important part in this course and the special treatment about odor problem is also studied.

description.zh: 1.概論 2.建築載重及結構反應 3.空間整合與結構系統 4.建築常用之結構系統,含形態成用系統,向量作用系統,面作用系統及體積作用等5.垂直結構系統 6.水平結構系統 7.高樓結構系統 8.基礎結構系統 9.結構系統與建造
description.en: 1.Course introduction 2.Structural loading and structural behaviors 3.Space integration and structural system 4.Popular structural systems 5.Vertical structural system 6.Horizontal structural system 7.High rise building structural system 8.Foundation structual system 9.Structural system and construction

description.zh: 本課程探討作業研究方法在營建工程之應用，課程內容包括作業方研究方法，施工作業研究，工期控制之作業研究，資源調配之作業研究，工期與成本控制之作業研究，施工材料之最佳管理，其他施工作業問題之研究。
description.en: operation's studyConstruction engineer and the study of operations. The study of the operation's method , construction , working phase, distribution the resources, working phase and cost control the best manage of construction making and other studies of working matters.

name.en: Legal Affairs and Dispute resolution in Construction

description.zh: 本課程主要教授與土木有關之法規，諸如建築法、建築技術規則、都市計劃法、採購法、環保法規、水利法等，併借相關案例之分析研究，訓練學生土木法規之知識與能力。
description.en: The course is dive lessons on code of building , rule of construction technology ,stock up code ,code of environmental protection etc.

description.zh: 本課程將包含不可壓縮流體之特性探討、管流與明渠流之特性、邊界層理論、數值模擬與主要水工構造物之設計原理。
description.en: Fundamental properties of incompressible fluids; hydrostatics and fluid motion in closed conduits and open channels; potential flow; boundary layers; preliminary design of hydraulic structures; numerical analysis.

description.zh: 首先介紹我國及美日等國的防災體制、組織權責、運作機制，並比較其優缺點。接著討論防災資訊、通訊及新興科技在災害防球上的應用。介紹各類天然及人為災害的理論及特性，如地震、颱風、淹水、坡地災害、土石流、施工災害、環境污染、工業災害、全球氣候變遷等。從減災、整備、應變、復原重建四個時序來探討防災計畫緊急應變計畫標準作業程序的內容與要點。
description.en: This course first introduces the disaster prevention systems,jurisdiction and responsibility, and operation mechanism of several countries including Taiwan,Japan and the  United States of America. The application of computer information, communication and advanced technologies for disaster prevention will also be discussed. The characteristics of various natural and man-made disasters, such as earthquakes, typhoons, floods, slope failures, debris flows, contruction incidents, environmental pollution, industrial hazards, and global weather changing will be introduced. The major contents of disaster prevention plans, emergency response plans and standard operation procedures will e discussed corresponding to the disaster mitigation, preparedness, response and recovery.

description.zh: 妥善地利用資源可促使資源生生不息，不當地濫用卻會帶來大地反撲，禍及人類，如何在建設的同時,大興土木之際，顧及生態體系，及為本課程之主要重點。課程內容包括環境生態系統、生態學之基本法則、質能傳遞、污染物對生態之影響。
description.en: The main purpose of this course is to learn how to use the natural sources for industrial development but alse maintain the ecological balance. Improper usage of natural resourses will bring adverse results. The topic will include:fundamental ecology, mass and energy transfer and the impact of industrial development on ecology.

description.zh: 本課程說明受壓構件之挫屈及挫屈後之線性及非線性行為及分析。整體挫屈及局部挫屈亦分別探討，圖使學生建立結構穩定之整體觀念。
description.en: To demonstrate the linear and nonlinear behaviore as well as analysis of buckling and postbuckling problems for pressed members. Both overall and local buckling are investigated.It is aimed to established an integrated idea for students at structural stability.

description.zh: 岩石工程是一門應用的課程，它的重點在於把基本的岩石力學的原理，運用在實際的工程問題上，因此，這門課將介紹岩石力學在岩石邊坡、岩石基礎、及岩石隧道上的應用。上課的學生在完成這門課之後，應該對這三大類的問題都有清楚的了解。為了使沒有上過岩石力學的學生也能進入狀況，這門課會先對岩體分類法（如RMR法及Q法）及立體投影圖加以回顧，然後再進行岩石邊坡工程、岩石基礎工程、及岩石隧道工程的介紹。「岩石工程」的課程大綱如下：
description.en: The focus of this course is the application of the basic principles of rock mechanics.  Three types of applications are to be covered in this semester-long course: rock slopes, rock foundations, and rock tunnels.  The students are expected to complete assignments in each of the above three categories.  To prepare students with no previous academic work in rock mechanics, this course will review the classification systems of rock masses (such as the RMR and the Q systems).  Also, the stereographic projection is a required tool, which will be introduced in this course.

description.zh: 專題演講或書報討論
description.en: In this course, we will invite speakers from the academia, industry and government to lectures on topics in computer science and information engineering.

notes: 博士班班上課教室綜科館208

description.zh: 基因體學工程學，是結合分子生物技術及電腦資訊科技的新領域。由於分子生物技術的快速發展，DNA定序的資料也在近幾年中以驚人的速度產生；而這大量的資料經由電腦資訊的整理分析，所延伸出來的知識，已被廣泛地運用在生物醫學上的研究。基因體學工程學，是現代生物科技必要的知識。
description.en: Genomic engineering is a newly developed field joining the knowledge from molecular biology and computational technology. Molecular biology techniques in high speed screening such as DNA sequencing have generated large amount of data.  From these data, new frontier in biomedical researches can be explored. Genomic engineering is one of the essential discipline of biotechnology。

description.zh: 配合高分子課程的講授，教導學生親自配製試葯、操作儀器﹐進行高分子聚合實驗、檢驗分析與結果討論﹐訓練學生的實驗室合成技巧及基本的高分子材料鑑定分析儀器之技術﹐包括光譜分析 (IR, NMR, UV, PL, EL etc), 分子量量測(GPC), 熱分析(DSC, TGA)等之分析技術
description.en: Experimental techniques include: the Lab work of polymer synthesis , the charterization of polymer materials and the operation of the related instruments, including spectrum analysis (IR, NMR, UV, PL, EL etc), the measurement of molecular weight (GPC), thermal analysis (DSC, TGA) etc.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。機械設計原理、機密機械特有設計考慮、機械結構件之靜態、動態、與熱傳分析。機械次系統單元如主軸單元、動力驅動、進給驅動、與控制系統等之設計與分析。機械之精度與效能分析。工具機之實務設計與分析個案研究。
description.en: Principles of machine design. Special design considerations in precision machinery. Static dynamic, and thermal analysis of structural members of machine. Analysis of sub-unit of machine like spindle unit, power drive unit, feed drive unit, and control system, etc. Accuracy and performance evaluation of machine, Case study with special emphasis on machine tool.

description.zh: 本課程分三單元，包括：(1) 應用量子力學：量子力學的基本結構，簡單量子系統，原子、分子及晶體之電子結構與能階，量子躍遷，量子統計，傳輸現象、量子雜訊，晶體能帶結構，量子光學，多體量子系統。(2)奈米材料學：奈米材料之基本性質，奈米材料特殊之物性，奈米材料擴散及燒結特性，特殊奈米材料、CNT製程與應用。(3)奈米顆粒材料：奈米顆粒材料特性，奈米顆粒材料之製程，奈米顆粒材料之檢測分析技術，奈米顆粒材料之光電應用，奈米顆粒材料之熱流應用，奈米顆粒材料之生化應用，奈米顆粒材料專題報告。
description.en: (1) Applied quantum mechanics: Basic approach, simple quantum systems, time dependent quantum phenomena, statistical physics, transport phenomena, quantum  optics,  many-body effects.(2) Nano materials: Fundamental properties of material special physical properties diffusion and sintering characteristics, carbon nano tube related fabrication process and application.(3) Nanoparticles Technology: Property of nano particles fabrication, measuring analysis, some applications related with optoelectronics fluid, thermal, and biochemistry project.

description.zh: 先修課程：光學。一、幾何光學   1.光學基本定律(3) 2.球面光學系統成像(3) 3.雷射光傳播特性(3) 4.光纖(6) 5.輻射度學與光度學(3)二、物理光學   1.光的電磁理論(3) 2.光波的疊加與分析(3) 3.光的干涉與干涉儀(6) 4.光學鍍膜(3) 5.光的繞射(6) 6.光的偏振(3) 7.晶體光學基礎(6)
description.en: A、Geometrical optics 1.Basic optical laws 2.Paraxial systems 3.Laser beams 4.Optical fiber 5.PhotometryB、Physical optics 1.EM waves of light 2.Superposition of light waves 3.Interference and interferometer 4.Optical coating and thin film 5.Diffraction 6.Polarization 7.Light in crystal

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。   真空工程, 直流電源, 射頻電源, 微波, 熱燈絲等各種能量方式之CVD化學氣相沉積法, PVD物理氣相沉積法, 電鍍技術,以及膜的特性觀察與實驗，包括SEM，EDX，XRD與金相顯微觀察，附著力測試等。1.光電半導體V-I特性分析試驗 2.接面型光電元件C-V量測實驗 3.光導電及少數載體存活時間量測實驗 4.邁克蓀干涉儀實驗(3)5.雷射繞射實驗(3) 6.偏振實驗(3)7.分光儀實驗(3)
description.en: The practices in vacuum engineering, variety deposition methods such as CVD, PVD and electroplating, that include DC, RF, microwave hot filament etc are be performed. Tests of film properties and its characterizations such as SEM, EDX, XRD, and metallurgical microscope are also be examined.1.Experiment on V-I characteristics of photonic devices.2.C-V measurements of optoelectronic devices.3.Measurements of photoconductivity and minority-carrier lifetime of photonic materials.4.Lab on Michelson interferometer5.Lab Experiment on diffraction 6.Lab on polarization7.Lab on spectrometer

description.zh: 先修課程：光學。 本課程介紹各種光學方法用以量測位移及角度之變化量，光學訊號是透過光電感測器轉換為電子訊號以便進行分析，其內容含：1.簡介 2.光學尺 3.干涉儀 4.幾何誤差 5.幾何光學尺 6.雷射光學尺 7.雙頻干涉儀
description.en: This course introduces the optical methods used to determine the displacements and angular rotations of a target. Optical signals are transferred into electronic signals for analysis. It involves：1.Introduction 2.Geometrical error 3.Laser encoder 4.Interferometers 5.Optical encoder 6.Optical

description.zh: 先修課程：電磁學、工程數學、近代物理。  由電磁學之理論推導光波在光導波管之運行、偶合及調變，並經由近代物理之量子論介紹雷射理論及光偵測器原理。經由雷射之電光調變、光導波管之電場調制與光偵測器之光電轉換，將積體光學之基本概念完整介紹，並針對其特性及應用，加以說明。
description.en: From the electromagnetic theory, the optical waves propagation, coupling, and modulating in optical wave-guides are proposed. Also from the quantum theory introduced by modern physics, the laser theory and the principles of photo detectors are introduced. By the concepts of electro-optical modulation of laser devices, electrical modulation of optical wave-guides, and the opto-electronic conversion of photo detector devices, the fundamental concepts of integrated optics are introduced. Also the characteristics and applications of integrated optics are presented.

description.zh: (1)課程簡介領域一：(2)醫學工程中的光學檢測(3)眼科的光學儀器(4)螢光學、光譜學與藥物分析(5)奈微米的雷射摘取術領域二：(6)DNA複製(7)基因簡介(8)蛋白質簡介(9)生物晶片的發展 領域三：(10)病毒與人類的疾病(11)光觸媒技術(12)光線力學的最新發展(13)總結論
description.en: (1) Introduction of course (2) Optical measurement in Medical engineering(3) Optical instruments for human's eyes(4) Fluorescence sensing technology, spectroscopy and pharmacy analysis(5) Micro and nano technology in Laser capture microdissection(6) DNA replication - recombinant DNA technology(7) Enzymes, enzyme kinetics, and immobilized enzyme systems(8) Protein conformation, dynamics, and functions(9) Biochip Technology(10) Virus and human diseases(11)Photocatalytic purification and treatments(12) Photodynamic Therapy(PDT) and Photodynamic diagnosis(PDD)(13)Overview of course and conclusion

description.zh: 本課程的目的在使學生建立有機半導體元件和次世代有機半導體平面顯示技術之基本觀念與基本實務方法, 並作為進階課程 "有機半導體元件物理"之前修課本課程主題包含:(1)有機半導體元件簡介(2)有機半導體元件實務技術專題討論(3)有機半導體平面顯示技術專題討論本課程除基本講授之外另包括學期報告及專題簡報, 後兩者將列入評分
description.en: The objective of this course is to let graduate students establish some fundamentals and practices related to organic semiconductor devices and flat-panel technology based on organic semiconductors. This course is also used as part of the prerequisite of advanced course named "Physics of Organic Semiconductor Devices".The topics of this course include:(1)Basis of the organic semiconductor devices(2)Practical technique of the organic semiconductor devices(3)Technologies of the organic semiconductor flat-panel displaysExcept for lecturing, term-paper and presentation of special topic are also included as grading policy.

description.zh: 機械振動、非線性振動、振動量測、振動抑制及隔離技術、振動與波之傳播、聲音之反射及折射、噪音之降低及吸音材料、消音器與噪音控制、法規及環境等。
description.en: Topics include: Mechanical vibration, Vibration  transmission, Vibration measurement, The use of vibration isolators and absorbers, Fundamentals of acoustics, Noise control engineering, Instrumentation and Law.

description.zh: 本課程提供理工學者撰寫科技論文之英文寫作技巧與指導，內容包括：扼要複習英文文法，詳細說明撰寫英文研究報告或論文時常犯的錯誤，深入討論標準英文寫作風格與修辭原則，提供簡易而有效的實作原則以提昇科技論文的可讀性。
description.en: This course develops a curriculum providing students with an English writing skill and direction focused on technical essays, including the followings : 1. Concise review of English grammars2. Frequent writing mistakes of essays or reports3. Deep discussion concerning standard English writing style and rhetoric principles4. Offering simple and practical writing principles to increase the readability of technology essays.

description.zh: 先修課程：電子學或應用電子學、或負責教授同意。探討PN接面之特性、短通道效應、表面通道技術原理、費米能階等基本元件物理、及0.25-0.18微米以下需明瞭元件物理知識。
description.en: Basic physics of semiconductor device, sub-half micro CMOS device, characteristics of P/N junction, short channel effect, surface channel N/P device, Fermi-level etc. The relative physical knowledge of 0.25 um device is discussed as well.

description.zh: 控制理論及應用簡介、線性空間及線性運算子、線性動態方程式及反應、可控制性可觀測性及穩定性、狀態回授及狀態預估、多變數I/O控制器設計及應用。
description.en: Introduction, Linear spaces and linear operators, linear dynamic equations, controllability, observability, stability analysis, state feedback and state prediction, multi-input multi-output systems, controller design and application.

description.zh: 本課程之主旨在於加強學生對水質化學之深入了解，以作為進一步對水質管理應用之基礎。課程內容包括高等平衡化學、高等複合化學、高等氧化還原化學在於薄膜處理、離子交換、吸附處理及高級消毒處理程序之應用
description.en: This class will provide graduate student authoritative information on the current knowledge of water chemistry, water quality and water quality control.  The topic will include the applications of Chemical equilibrium, Redox reaction and coordination chemistry on water treatment processes such as CSF, membrane, GAC, Ion exchange and disinfection processes.

description.zh: 藉由說明環境系統化管理之原理，使學生對國際環境管理系統之趨勢與可能的貿易衝擊有充分了解與因應。並共同探討國內企業如何推行環境管理系統，永續發展，以增強企業界之國際競爭力。課程內容包含：(1)環境管理系統，環境績效評估，與環境稽核之原理。(2)歐美日環境管理系統之介紹　 以歐美日資源再回收使用、廢棄物處理、毒性、化學物、重大意    外事件之處理為例，說明環境管理系統之應用實務。(3)國際環境管理標準   介紹ISO9000、ISO14000與TQM，以提昇企業界之品質，降低成本   並提昇國際競爭力。
description.en: Associated with fundamentals and theory, the course provides an overall systematic management framework to solve the problems encountered in Taiwan as well as international countries. The main contents of this course include:(1)Principle in Environmental Management System.(2)Case study on American,Japan and EC for advanced EMS.(3)ISO series (9000 ;14000)and TQM(Total Quality Management).

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。導論（含系統概論、資料表示法）、微電腦結構－中央處理單元、組合語言－指令型定址法、模組化程式、位元組和字串處裡、I/O 程式、DOS 功能常式、多元程式規劃、系統匯流排結構、I/O 介面、半導體記憶、多元處裡器組態。
description.en: Introduction (Overview of Microprocessor System, Data Representation), Microprocessor Architecture-CPU etc., Assembler Language-Instruction Format, Addressing Modes, Modular Programming, Byte and String Manipulation, I/O Programming, DOS Function Multiprogramming, SystemBus Structure, I/O Interface, Semiconductor Memory, Multiprocessor Configurations.

description.zh: 複習矩陣及向量、狀態空間描述法、求解狀態空間方程式、可控制性及可觀察性、穩定性分析、狀態變數回饋系統的設計、簡介最佳控制、簡介強健控制。
description.en: Review of matrices and vectors, state space representation of control systems, the solution of the state space equations, controllability and observability, stability analysis, design of state variable feedback systems, optimal control systems, and robust control systems.

description.zh: 本課程的目標在使學生了解工業安全衛生的重要,熟悉有關知識及緊急措施,從而增加處變之因應能力.內容包括工業安全衛生組織,事故調查分析,工廠設備安全要領,工業衛生和衛生設備.
description.en: This course is design to introduce the student to concept of the importance of industrial safety and health with emphasis on the ability of dealing with accidents. Topics covered are organization of industrial safety , analysis of Accident ,industrial health and facilities.

description.zh: 先修課程：3002014或負責教授同意。基本熱傳理論、郎肯循環：蒸汽發生設備、渦輪機、冷凝器、泵及風扇、氣輪機及複合循環；核能原理、PWR、BWR、GCR、LMFBR；再生能源：地熱、太陽能、風力、海洋能源；能源之儲存；環境污染之防治。
description.en: Principles of Heat Transfer, Rankine Cycle: Steam Generators, Turbines Condensers, Pumps and Fans, Gas-Turbine and Combined Cycles, Principles of Nuclear Energy, Nuclear Power Plants: PWR, BWR, GCR, LMFBR, Renewable Energy Resources: Geothermal Energy, Solar Energy, Wind Energy, Energy from the Oceans, Energy Storage, Environmental Aspects of Power Generation.

name.en: Introduction to Thin Film Science and Engineering

description.zh: 薄膜材料科學，真空科學與技術，薄膜蒸鍍製程，放電、電漿、離子與表面作用，物理氣相沈積，化學氣相沈積，基材表面與薄膜成核，薄膜結構，薄膜性質測試，薄膜之相互擴散、反應與轉換，薄膜之機械性質。
description.en: 1. Thin film materials science2. Vacuum science and technology 3. Thin film evaporation processes4. Discharge, plasma, and ion-surface interaction5. Plasma and ion beam processing of thin films6. Chemical vapor deposition7. Substrate surfaces and thin film nucleation8. Film structure9. Characterization of thin films and surface10. Interdiffusion, reactions, and transformations in thin films11. Mechanical properties of thin films

description.zh: 全球化製造體系的形成，使得合約製造商必須以更積極的態度，從策略面出發，藉由各種電腦與網路的技術，整合內部與外部的流程與資訊，打造數位工廠。數位製造的目的，是希望藉由資訊透明化，提升整個製造體系的競爭優勢。課程的設計，是以概念介紹的方式，說明數位製造的應用現況與相關技術。本課程的內容包括：數位製造概論、數位製造實例說明、商業模型分析、企業知識入口網站、產品資料管理、交易系統、資料倉儲、企業資訊入口網站。
description.en: Brief: Globalization has lead contract manufactures more active on seeking new strategies to survive. To increase competition, new technologies, such as computer and network technology, have applied. Computer and network technology can integrate internal and external information to establish a so-called "e-factory." This course covers different issues related to e-Manufacturing, such as Concept of e-Manufacturing, Case Study, Business Model Analysis, Knowledge Management, Enterprise Knowledge Portal (EKP), Product Data Management (PDM), Concept of Trading Systems, Concept of Data Warehousing, Enterprise Information Portal (EIP), Workflow Management, State of the Art Technologies, etc

description.zh: 自動化機構運動及動力分析、控制理論與氣液壓學簡介、機構元件說明、馬達及感測器選用。
description.en: Kinematic and dynamic Analysis of automatic mechanisms, Control theorem, Introduction to pneumatics and Hydraulics,Mechanism elements, Selection of motors and sensors.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。本課程主要介紹幾何光學與Coherent光學兩部份之基本概念與應用﹐提供機械領域的學生有關光的知識﹐讓機械領域的學生有能力加入機光電技術整合。本課程首先介紹幾何光學﹐幾何光學雖然簡單﹐卻是光學應用最普遍的知識﹐接著進入Coherent光學原理與應用介紹﹐Coherent光學在光量測技術部份佔了非常重要的地位﹐透過本課程的訓練﹐學生將可更順利的進入光學實驗室工作﹐當然﹐本課程也適合其他對光學有興趣的學生來修習。
description.en: The lectures in this course include two main parts, the geometrical and the coherent optics. Due to the future high technology, the optomechatronics, needs the cooperation of knowledge among the optics, the electrics, and the mechanics. This course gives the students of mechanical engineering the chance to participate in this work group. The lecture will first show the students the geometrical optics which is simple but important in the field of optical application. The coherent optics is the main part in this course which occupies the most optical technique of measurement. After the course the students should have the enough knowledge to work in the optical laboratory. Certainly, this course is also useful for all students who are interest in the area of the optics.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。半導體元件簡介、電晶體開關電路、數位積體電路及應用、矽控整流子（SCR）、矽控整流子觸發電路、雙向矽控整流器、運算放大器及應用感測器及應用、電動機驅動電路、變頻器電路。
description.en: Semiconductor Components, Transistor Switch Circuits, Digital ICs and Application, Silicon-Controlled-Rectifier (SCR), Trigger Circuits for SCR, Triac, Operational Amplifier and Application, Sensor and Application, Drivers for Electrical Machines, and Inverters.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。有效迅速的產品開發左右產業的競爭力. 本課程透過分組實際演練新產品的開發, 介紹產品開發的流程, 團隊組織架構及所需要的考量.
description.en: This course is design to develop the interdisciplinary skills required for successful product development in today's competitive marketplace. Engineering students form small product development teams to step through the new product development process in detail, learning about the available tools and techniques to execute each process step along the way. Each student brings his or her own disciplinary perspective to the team effort, and must learn to synthesize that perspective with those of the other students in the group to develop a sound, marketable product. Students can expect to depart the semester understanding new product development processes as well as useful tools, techniques and organizational structures that support new product development practice.

description.zh: 無機化學係化學三大骨架之一，日常生活中之各樣物質大部分是由無機材料製成，課程係以深入淺出方式教授，授課內容涵蓋主族元素與過渡元素。課程內容包括:原理、主族元素化學、硼族、第1, 2, 15, 16, 17 族元素、過渡元素化學、過渡元素、第一過渡系列元素、鈦,鉻,鈷,鎳,銅
description.en: Inorganic chemistry is one of the three frames of chemistry. Various materials in our daily life are composed of inorganic materials. This course will be given in a manner of easy-getting-point. The contents comprise of chemistry of main group elements and transition elements.  The course covers the following topics: (1) Survey of principles (2) Chemistry of main group elements (A. Boron; B. Group 1, 2, 15, 16, 17 Elements) (3) Chemistry of transition elements (A. Survey of Transition Elements; B. Elements of the first transition series; C. Titanium, Chromium, Cobalt, Nickel and Copper.

description.zh: 一、線性連立方程式二、矩陣基本運算三、行列式四、向量空間與基底五、線性相依與線性獨立六、線性轉換七、正交空間八、特徵值與特徵向量
description.en: As a basic mathematics in engineering,the course Linear Algebraemphasizes on the subjest of matrix computation(theory) and thetechnique of mathematical proving.The outline of the course includes the following:1.Systems of Linear Equations2.Matrices3.Determinants4.Vector Spaces5.Linear Transformations6.Eigenvalues and Eigenvectors7.Advanced Topics: selet one of the following if time permitted:  Numerical Techniques in Matrix operations,Jordan form,or     Linear Programming.

description.zh: 科技日語閱讀技巧解說，日文技術資料查尋及研讀，科技外來語及說明書講解與閱讀，技術用語及電機專業用日本語。
description.en: Study technology Japanese, Read Japanese guide book and illustrations, High-Tech Japanese and electrical Japanese.

description.zh: (1)信號取樣與信號重整 (2)分時多工脈幅調變之傳送與接收(3)脈碼調變之傳送與接收系統 (4)Delta調變 (5)適應性Delta調變 (6)數位數據編碼 (7)振幅移鍵數位調變 (8)頻率移鍵數位調變 (9)相移鍵數位調變 (10)正交相移數位調變 (11)雙旁波AM的產生 (12)雙旁波AM的接收 (13)FM電波。
description.en: course title : communication lab.description : this course is to let students understand the communication techniques through the experiments

description.zh: 1. 半導體物理特性分析2. 二極體電路設計3. BJT放大器設計4. FET放大器設計5. 頻率響應分析及設計6. 回授放大器設計7. 差動及多級大器設計8. 連算放大器設計9. 振盪器設計10. 主動濾器設計11. 穩壓電路設計

And multistage Amp. Design8. Operational Amp Design9. Oscillator design.  10. Active filter Design.  11. Power supply Design.

description.zh: 1. 通訊系統比較2. 光纖通訊的優點3. 光纖4. 光發射器及光源5. 檢光器及接收器6. 光纖系統設計7. 先進光波系統8. 光放大器9. 光纖通訊實習(3~5個實驗)

description.zh: 認識通俗科技文章及科技學術論文語法、文體、結構組織等特質，並探討技術報告及論文撰寫方式。
description.en: This course helps the learners recognize the syntax, style, and organization as far as the papers on technology and technical writings are concerned. Discussions include specific ways to technical presentation and technical writings.

description.zh: 最佳化組合邏輯之演算法，可規劃邏輯元件，組合邏輯之VLSI設計，使用MSI與標準電路元件設計多層邏輯，使用閘陣列設計，循序邏輯之元件，循序邏輯之分析與合成，VLSI之設計與測試技巧，各種CALD軟體工具介紹。
description.en: 1.Algorithms for Optimization of combirational logic2.VLSI realizations of combination logic3.Multilevel logic using complex parts and cells.4.Components of sequential systems5.Synthesis of clock-mode sequential circuits.

description.zh: 讓學生對於模糊邏輯、模糊推論有一整體性了解，並對於將模糊邏輯在控制工程之應用具有理論與軟體撰寫之能力。
description.en: 1. To familiarize students with fuzzy logic and fuzzy inference. 2. To familiarize students with designing controllers based on fuzzy inference. 3. To familiarize students with system modeling through fuzzy rules.

description.zh: 本課程由基本構造分析概念、運動力學分析、板塊構造等之介紹，進一步闡述斷層、節理、褶曲、劈理等構造現象。
description.en: The basic concept of structural dynamic analysis, introduction of plate tectonic and origin & characteristics of strata, fault, joints, fold and cleavage.

description.zh: 本課程包含1.複合材料的基礎知識：如複合材質及複合過程，複合構造及組織、複合材料的力學性質等基本知識。2.各種複合材料的 介紹，如炭素纖維強化複合材料金屬等複合材料等，原理及應用之 介紹。3.對於尖端技術領域之應用。複合材料大致可區分為高分子 基複材，金屬基複材，陶瓷基複材及纖維複材四種。纖維複材中， 可依強度，韌性和成本需求而選用玻璃纖維、硼纖維、碳纖維、有 機纖維、陶瓷纖維、金屬纖維等作為強化元件。上述各種複材製造 方法，介面結構，機械性質，應用，微觀力學、巨觀力學、強度、 破裂、疲勞和設計均為討論內容。
description.en: The course includes the following items: 1.The basic knowledge of composite materials such as composite materials, composite process and composite structure and tissue, the dynamics property of composite materials. 2.The introduction of all kinds of composite materials, such as the principle and application of reinforced composite material of carbon-fiber. 3.The application of composite materials at the most advanced area.The composite materials approximately can be classified into polymer base composite material, metal base composite material, ceramic base composite material, and fibre composite material. The fiber composite material can be selected as reinforced parts according to strength, toughness and cost requirement, such as glassfiber, boronfiber, carbonfiber, organic fiber, ceramic fiber, metal fiber.The above-mentioned manufacturing method, interface structure, mechanical property, application, microdynamics, macrodynamics, strength, fracture, fatigue and design are all the c

description.zh: 介紹電子陶瓷之原理及應用 訓練學生對電子陶瓷材料性質認識，並進而介紹陶瓷材料基本製程。課程重點在陶瓷粉体製備成形方法，燒結及燒結理論，除加強學生認識傳統陶瓷外，並對電子陶瓷之應用，作有系統的介紹。課程內容將對日常生活常見之介電陶瓷, 壓電陶瓷, 焦電陶瓷, 半導體陶瓷及磁性陶瓷等部分作深入淺出介紹.
description.en: introduction to electronic ceramics In this course, the dielectric ceramics, piezoelectric ceramics, pyroelectric ceramics, semiconducting ceramics and magnetic ceramics will be introduced with their applications

description.zh: 專業技術不斷開創與努力，如果再配合管理經營的能力，即能相得益彰，成就非凡。工廠管理是用來探討經營或管理工廠的方法，即以工廠管理人員的立場，研究如何應用最有效的方法，來組合應用各項生產要素，以獲得工廠經營的目標。目前工業發展情況，政府的工業措施與方案，以及我國文化背景，都必須與工廠管理的方法結合，才能成為最佳的經營者。
description.en: It would be an extraordinary achievement if an endless creative professional skill can be matched with excellent management ability. This course is used to discuss the method of management or administration, that is to make a research in using the most effective approach to combine all the necessary production elements from the viewpoint of factory management class, so that the management objective can be reached. The current industry development, the initiative and policy of industry, and the culture background of this country all have to be matched with factory management strategy, thus, would become the best management once and for all.

description.zh: 本課程主要在提供學生有關計算機系統之基本知識及應用。授課內容包括：1.電腦的演進  2 .電腦的硬體架構(內部組件、中央處理機及主記憶體、輸出入裝置、資料儲存媒介與裝置)  3. 電腦的軟體(電腦系統概述、作業系統、資料組織與檔案處理、程式語言簡介、程式設計與軟體開發、資訊系統設計與發展程序)  4.計算機的應用。
description.en: This introductory course covers the fundamentals and applications of computers, including, 1.the evolution of  computers, 2.computer hardware structure , 3.computer software & applications.

description.zh: 本課程主要在提供學生有關計算機系統之基本知識及應用。授課內容包括：1.電腦的演進  2 .電腦的硬體架構(內部組件、中央處理機及主記憶體、輸出入裝置、資料儲存媒介與裝置)  3. 電腦的軟體(電腦系統概述、作業系統、資料組織與檔案處理、程式語言簡介、程式設計與軟體開發、資訊系統設計與發展程序)  4.計算機的應用。

description.zh: 本課程之目的在於討論資源開發進行中及開發後所可能對環境造成之衝擊以及如何因應之對策，其中包括空氣、水、噪音及震動等之控制方法。對於開發後之土地復整及二次利用亦在本課程討論之列。
description.en: This class is to discuss the impact of the mining operations to the environment and how these problem can be resolved.  It includes air, water, noise and vibration controls.  It also discuss the mine reclamation and secondary usage of mined land.

description.zh: 一、合成方法--固相、溶液、氣相反應法二、成核與晶體成長機構與速率三、單晶合成-矽晶、石英及鑽石四、粉末合成-鈦酸鋇系、氧化鐵系、氧化鋯、氧化鋁、氧化鋅之合成五、薄膜技術簡介
description.en: 一、Method - solid liquid and vapor state reaction二、Mechanism and rate of neucleation and crystal growth三、Single crystal- silicon silica and diamond四、Powders- Barium titanite Ferrites Zirconia Alumina Zinc oxide五、Introduction to thin film techniques

description.zh: 本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。
description.en: All students are required to attend two hours per week of Physical Education class. This requirement applies to Freshman Sophomore and Junior students while it is an elective for senior students.  For Freshman level, Classes focus on basic physical strength training.  For Sophomore and Junior students, classes are interest-oriented, thus giving students the opportunity to select specific activities they are interested in.  Choices include Basketball, Volleyball, Table Tennis, Badminton, Bowling, Archery, Golf, Tennis, Gymnastics, Slow pitch, Tai Chi Chuan, Ballroom Dancing, Physical Fitness and martial arts, to mention a few.

description.zh: 了解各種珠寶種類材質、製作技術、製造流程及設備並應用設計的基礎能力,發揮珠寶首飾的設計創意、造形表達；學習珠寶首飾描繪表現技法及基礎製圖法。
description.en: The course is concerned with the design and production of jewellery , siversmithing and related products and is delivered through a programme of lectures and practical design projects in terms of types of materials,techniques ofproduction , and its processes and equipments. Based on the foundation of design skills, the students can practice the techniques of presentation and drawing, and learn how to create new designs of jewellery and its related products.

description.zh: 應用各種表現技法並使用CAD,多媒體等高科技手法,使設計作品之發表及簡報方式能達到視覺上更豐富而生動的表達效果.
description.en: Following ‘Design Presentation Techniques (I)and (II)’ the studio course aims to provide the student with design presentation techniques using computer as tools of simulation and presentation.

description.zh: 練習設計構想草圖速繪法；從基本幾何形體至複雜產品、空間循序漸進；常用材質（木質、金屬、透明材質、石材及皮革等）之表現技法；產品精描、透視圖法、三視圖、爆炸圖、組立圖等之精描，說明圖板及各種畫材（麥克筆、粉彩、色鉛筆及水彩）等之應用。
description.en: This course put emphasis on offering students having enough skills on :1.Abilities to sketch their idea visible to the others.2.Coloring design sketches to let the drawings have better comprehensibility.3.Good skill for Renderings. Medias for this course shall include markers, pastels water colors and color pencils.

description.zh: 本課程為設計理論的講授，其內容包含溝通基本觀念、感知心理、記號理論、情報理論、傳達理論等之理論架構及應用模式。
description.en: The study of design methodology, including the theory structure and application module of the basic communication knowledge, conception psychology, symbolization theory, information theory and communication theory.

description.zh: 介紹家具產銷體系從原始概念、產品發展以迄賣到最後消費者手中所涉及之種種。課程內容包括行銷研究、產品開發、標價計畫、配銷、廣告促銷以及行銷計畫等。
description.en: An introduction to furniture production and marketing systems. Emphasis is on the role of marketing in a managerial context. Areas studied include: Product development, marketing research and information systems, pricing, adverising, promotion, distribution and inventory management.

description.zh: 完整且有系統的介紹設計實務工作的活動，從規劃設立、執行、管理、協調及最終之提交檢討。並以各專案實例說明設計的過程所遭遇之問題點，以及如何因應之道。
description.en: The overall and systematic introduction of activities in a design case, from proposal setup, achievement, management, negotiation and the final review, accompanying with the problems and solutions encountering in the actual projects.

name.zh: 光電元件製造技術及原理

description.zh: 本課程將介紹光電材料的種類與基本特性，包括材料的光電性質、磁性性質及導電與介電性質等的基本物理與化學概念，並探討其相關應用與目前發展狀況，以了解各種光電材料的製程、特性與原理。
description.en: The course introduces the categories of optoelectronic devices and their fundamental properties, including the optical, magnetic and electric as well as dielectric properties. Furthermore, the usage of such devices and their future applications will be discussed. The manufacturing technology of these optoelectronic devices will be investigated along with their processing units as well as basic mechanisms.

description.zh: 此課程內容將涵蓋植物基礎科研及生物科技層面之相關資訊，主要主題將包括：     植物重要特性之概要介紹 (包括生長與發育、各種逆境反應等主題)     植物遺傳學 (包括傳統及分子遺傳層面)     植物基因體及基因之組成與結構     植物基因表達與調控     植物生物科技：從技術與平台系統到生技應用 (例如：基因轉殖、培育新植物品種、植物生物反應器等主題)     植物功能基因體研究：從技術與平台系統到生技應用 (例如：基因體、蛋白質體、代謝質體、基因靜默等主題)     植物生物科技之正負面考量
description.en: This course will cover basic and applied knowledge about plant molecular biology and biotechnology. The contents of this course will include the following topics:     Brief introduction to plants (Growth and development, response to stresses, etc.)     Plant genetics (traditional and molecular aspects)     Plant genome and gene organization and structures     Plant gene expression and regulation     Plant biotechnology: From techniques and platforms to biotechnological applications (e.g. gene transfer, breeding for new plant varieties, plant bioreactors, etc.)     Plant functional genomic study: From techniques and platforms to biotechnological applications (e.g. genomics, proteomics, metabolomics, gene silencing, etc.)     Pro and cons of plant biotechnology

description.zh: 由環境保護的觀點來了解化學工業及其他產業之污染源，並且教授資源回收、減廢技術、進而設計清潔生產製程，以達到廢棄物資源化與管理的最終目
description.en: This course introduces the waste sources from chemical and This course introduces the waste sources from chemical and other industries. And the course will cover the techniques for waste recycle and reduction. Furthermore, the final goal is to design a cleaner technology process for achieving the waste minimization and waste management.

description.zh: 結合生物技術與化工原理來進行微生物、動、植物細胞之培養、酵素之提取、反應動力學、生物反應器的操作與相關參考數之獲取法、產品之分離程序等。
description.en: In combination of biotechnology and chemical engineering to learn cell incubation, enzyme purification, bioreactor operation, and product separation, etc.

description.zh: 介紹工業觸媒在化學工業上所扮演的重要角色與有關吸附與催化之理論基礎，使學生瞭解工業觸媒的各種型態、物性、化性、鑑定方法、基本製造方法、性能評估及動力測試等內容在工業上實際應用例包括氫化、氧化、烷基化、裂解、重組、分餾、脫硫工程、汽車廢氣之控制以及藥物之合成。
description.en: Studies of homogeneous and heterogeneous catalysis, with emphasis on industrial applications. Catalytic processes, engineering problems, catalysts preparation, deactivation and regeneration also discussed.

description.zh: 本課程介紹目前各種材料的製程及功能，並探討材料的性質與材料組成原子的電子組態、原子間之化學鍵結、及晶體結構間的關係。本課程涵蓋了下列內容：1.原子的電子組態及原子間之化學鍵結，2.晶體結構，3.晶體缺陷與固體中的擴散，4.相圖與相變化，5.金屬材料及工程合金，6.陶瓷材料的結構、性質、製程與應用，7.高分子材料的結構、性質、應用與加工，8.複合材料，9.材料之機械性質，10.材料之電性質，11.材料之熱性質，12.材料之磁性質，13.材料之光學性質，14.材料的腐蝕與蛻化，15.半導體材料、生醫材料、先進材料、智慧型材料及奈米科技，16.材料與環境的相互影響，17.材料的選擇與設計考量。
description.en: This course introduces the fabrication and performance of various materials as well as the relationships that exist between the chemical bonding, structures and properties of materials.It covers the following topics: Atomic Structures and Interatomic Bonding; Structure of Crystalline Solids; Imperfections and Diffusion in Solids; Phase Diagrams and Phase Transformations; Applications and Processing of Metal and Alloys; Structures, Properties, Applications and Processing of Ceramics; Structures, Characteristics, Applications and Processing of Polymers; Composites; Mechanical Properties of Materials; Electrical Properties of Materials; Thermal Properties of Materials; Magnetic Properties of Materials; Optical Properties of Materials; Corrosion and Degradation of Materials; Semiconductors, Biomaterials, Advanced Materials, Smart Materials and Nanotechnology; Environmental Issues in Materials Science and Engineering; Materials Selection and Design Considerations.

description.zh: 電子體構裝技術是將積體電路和其它電元件，依設計聯結在一系統中，再以構裝材料將晶片、基座及釘架封包。本課程將介紹高分子構裝、及其相關技術、與工業現況。
description.en: Semiconductor packaging is the techniques that integrate the electronic to allow the chips into an individual protective package, mounted with other components in hybrid or multichip modules, or connected directly onto a printed circuit board. This course will introduce techniques of polymer packaging and metal wire bonding.

description.zh: 以初學者為對象,基本理論與實際並重.從緒論,微生物之形態,分類與變異,微生物一般特性,微生物之發酵代謝,微生物催化劑等係簡介應用微生物之一般基礎概念.然後敘述釀造食品工業,微生物應用工業,微生物之遺傳與育種,微生物特殊機能之應用,培養工程學等,最後介述生物科技與化學工業之關係等.使讀者對各項微生物工業之應用技術,具有全般性概念.
description.en: This course introduces the general concepts of Bioscience and Biotechnique Especially, it aims on Applied Microbiology, such as the fundamental knowledge of the characteristics and classification, Mechanisms of fermentations, general biochemistry, the microbial biocatalysts, Fermented-foods, Applied Microbial Industries etc. In addition, it includes genetics, Special uses of Bionics, and describes the reaction between Biotechnology and Chemical Industries, among them, it cares with the protection of Environmental.

description.zh: 知識管理是二十一世紀知識與學習型企業發展知識經濟最主要的技能，而營建與土木工程是一個需要專業知識的技術型產業，故亦應融入知識管理之理念。本課程基於上述理念，分別介紹營建興土木工程之相關專業技能，知識管理與企業e化發展技術，進而探討營建導入知識管理之技巧與方法。
description.en: Knowledge Management(KM) is the most important technique of learning type business for developing knowledge economy in the 21st century.Construction and civil engineering need to conduct knowledge management due to they are complex and full with professional techniques.This course will introduce related professional techniques of construction and civil engineering,the development technology of knowledge management and a e business,also will illustrate the conducting methods of construction knowledge management.

description.zh: 使學習者瞭解土壤與岩石之性質對隧道設計、開挖之相互關係。課程內容包括隧道工程介紹、隧道之荷重及應力分佈、地質調查、支撐及襯砌設計、各類隧道施工之方法及計測儀器之說明。
設計相關專題，以文獻研讀，邀請專家專題演講，及論文討論為重點，參與者透過密集討論、書面報告、或舉行口頭發表等方式，可以有效率地交換意見，獲得更深入而廣泛的認識。
description.en: Topical studies in history, theory, and criticism of design. Under the above goals, inviting addresses for special topics will be arranged though the courses. The Participants are encouraged to have intensive discussion, written reports, or further oral presentation. Efficient opinion exchange would be also expected to derive more extensive interest.

description.zh: 講授設計相關學術研究的基本特質與科學方法的傳統。本課程之目標在於呈現各種研究方法的特質與限制，進而引導初學者以策略性的思考進行文獻探討並架構適當的設計研究策略，最後得以研擬具可行性的研究計劃。上述設計研究策略包括：文獻探討的方法與策略，蒐集研究資料的方法與策略，抽樣的效用與策略，及資料分析的策略等。
description.en: Lecture on theories of academic research and characteristic of science approaches in design research. This course aims to present learners with a variety of research methods and conduct individuals through the process of (1) strategic literature research, (2) constructing proper research strategies and finally (3) organize feasible research plans.

description.zh: 人機境互動設計專題係使用者、產品、環境彼此之間互動作用為主題，思考其介面設計，產品語言和溝通之脈絡。透過理論、案例、實作，驗證產品創新方法。
description.en: Human-Machine-Environment interaction design is a field in which designers discover and respond to people's spoken and unspoken needs through analyzing physical, cognitive, social, and cultural human factors. These factors reveal human needs and activities in an effort to create products, messages, services, and systems that fit people's lifestyles. Human-centered design employs methods including behavioral observation, prototyping, and systems design.

description.zh: 本課程主要介紹多媒體設計系統其中包括系統的操作技巧、運動與動畫製作技巧、互動與交談設計、軟體除錯與包裝、多媒體教材製作等相關技術。
description.en: This module is concerned with Multimedia Authoring Scripting and the use of Multimedia Development Tools and applying them in cross-platform multimedia production.  This course provides the student with a knowledge of the various concepts and techniques used in multimedia systems

description.zh: 一、	從廣域範圍介紹自然生態與人文資源永續發展之道二、	藉由我國現階段環境發展策略及個案經驗，實務討論生態環境課題與措施。三、	課程內容涵蓋台灣自然與生態環境現況、森林、山坡地、農地、能源、海洋、自然保育、人文環境保育、環境法規、環境影響評估。
description.en: 1.	It will introduce the sustainable development of natural ecology and human resources through wide range.2.	It will emphasize with students to discuss the issues and strategies on environmental ecology. Those discussions will depend on national environmental development policies and special cases in recent years.3.	This course will include Taiwan nature and ecology, forest, lands lope , farmland, coastal area, natural conservation , human resources ,environmental impact assessment.

description.zh: 本課程以講授廢棄物減量與資源回收再利用之相關方法與技術為主，使學生從學習過程中瞭解4R之原理，此包括：1.減廢方法與技術 2.資源化方法與技術 3.廢棄物再利用方法與技術 4.廢棄物生命週期之分析 5.減廢策略與管理體系
description.en: "Resource Recovery and Managemet" is a course to introduce the principle of 4R in waste management. Contents of the course consist of approaches and technology for waste minimization, recovery, and reuse, life cycle analysis, and management policy.

name.en: The Study of Design Business Management(I)

description.zh: 設計事業管理的重要性與複雜性並不低於一般事業機構，但多數設計事業經營者並未受過正規事業管理訓練，因而或遭遇經營上的困難，或無法在事業經營領域有長足的表現。設計事業管理研究（一）重點可分為：1. 設計事業本質之探討； 2. 設計溝通；3. 設計市場學。透過良好的事業管理，設計業者可望為客戶提供更好的產品與服務；創造更好的利潤並有助於整體設計事業界之提升。
description.en: The management of design business is no less important and complex than any business but most designers or design practitioners seemed unfamiliar with this field; therefore, might have experienced difficulties while running the design firm. This study involves exploring: 1. the essence of the design profession; 2. effective design communication; 3. design marketing. Excellent performance of design business management leads to good design products/services; it leads also better profit to the design practitioner and the overall benefit to the design profession.

description.zh: 專題報告，專題演講，研究小組討論Case Study, Seminar
description.en: Case Study, Seminar

description.zh: 先介紹各種傳統加工方法 (車、鑽、銑、刨、磨)，再介紹非傳統加工方法與製造程序，包括：非傳統加工總論、光機電加工特性、製程中之物理參數、尺寸精度及表面光度、超音波加工、電化學加工與電化學研磨、電子束加工、雷射加工及化學材料切除法等，最後介紹各種非傳統加工方法在車輛製造中之使用現況。
description.en: Introduce the traditional manufacturing methods and nontraditional manufacturing methods. Nontraditional manufacturing processes are currently employed by many diverse industries, yet many manufactures are unaware of these processes and the benefits that can be realized by implementing them. In addition to presenting nontraditional manufacturing processes application for vehicle manufacturing.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。此課程對製造、設計、動力組甚為重要。內容有：流體靜壓、動壓及熱力學基本觀念、氣液壓傳動元件之靜、動態特性、氣液壓傳動元與機動間之關係、氣液壓傳動元與電腦控制、氣液壓技術實例。
description.en: Review of Fluid Static, Dynamics and Thermodynamics, Static and Dynamic Characteristics of Fluid Transmission Components and System, Computer-Control Fluid Power Systems, Case Study.

description.zh: 本課程將介紹如何利用X-光晶體繞射方法、NMR、電子顯微鏡、生物分子電腦模擬技術，以獲得生物大分子的三維結構，並探討其在生物科技上的應用。
description.en: The aim of this course is to introduce how to construct three-dimensional macromolecule structures by using X-ray diffraction, NMR, EM and computer simulation methods. Meanwhile, its applications to biotechnology will also be covered.

description.zh: 介紹真空技術基本概念、各種真空泵原理、真空元件用材料特性、各種真空元件及其材料特性、真空壓力量測技術、真空計工作原理、真空系統設計、真空測漏技術及真空系統之各種應用，使用和維修。
description.en: An introduction course for the basic concept of vacuum technology, vacuum pump, system components and their material properties. The measuring methods of vacuum system, working principals of vacuum meter, system design, leak-detecting technology and the applications of vacuum system will also be presented.

description.zh: 本課程之目的為訓練學生有關電子設備散熱設計之相關原理與技術。介紹各項電子元件之發熱量、溫度與元件穩定性之關係，熱對流、熱輻射等熱傳原理在電子設備散熱之的應用法則；解說電子設備散熱器之演進與設計原理，如：熱管之原理與演進、小型風散之特性與設計原則等。探討電子設備的熱阻抗分析、溫度計算、熱應力分析，並介紹相關電腦輔助分析軟體。
description.en: This course introduces principles and techniques of thermal management and cooling design of electronic equipments.  Subjects of this course include: thermal and physical properties of electronic components, thermo-fluid phenomena and principles of thermal management for electronic devices, and the evolution of cooling devices such as heat pipes and micro fans, discussion of analysis methodologies and computer software of thermal management problems including thermal resistances, temperature gradient, and thermal stress.

name.zh: 高等類比積體電路設計

description.zh: 電容切換式電路、振盪器、濾波器、鎖相迴路、非線性與匹配效應、短通道效應與元件模型、類比電路佈局與包裝
description.en: Switched-capacitor circuits, Oscillators, Continuous-time filters, Phase-locked loop, Nonlinearity and mismatch, Short-channel effects and device models, Layout and packaging for analog IC.

description.zh: 以金屬材料之基本觀念為基礎，更進一步探討銅，鋁，鎂，鎳等合金之特性、用途及其熱處理，並以近年來頗受注目的高強度鋁合金之特性，從組織結構加以探討。課程內容有:1.高強度鋁及鋁合金之種類，特性、用途及其熱處理探討。2.特殊及耐蝕銅及銅合金之種類，特性、用途及其熱處理探討。3.錫，鉛，鋅及其合金之種類，特性、用途探討。4.耐蝕，高強度鎳及鎳合金之種類，特性、用途探討。5.高強度，耐氧化性鈦及鈦合金之種類，特性、用途之探討。6.高科技用貴金屬之種類，特性、用途之探討。
description.en: Using the basic concept of metal material as foundation to further discuss thecharacteristics, usage and heat treatment of the alloy of Cu, Al, Mg,Ni, it alsodiscusses the eye-catching high strength property of aluminum alloy at the recentyears, and study it from the viewpoint of tissue structure. The course contentincludes the following items:1.The specification, usage and property of highstrength aluminum and aluminum alloy, and the study of their heat treatment. 2.The specification, usage and property of special copper, anti-corrosion copper andcopper alloy, and the study of their heat treatment. 3.The specification, usage andproperty study of Sn, Pb, Zn and their alloy. 4.The specification, usage and propertystudy of anti-corrosion, high strength nickle and nickle alloy. 5.The specification, usage and property study of high strength, oxidation resistant titanium and titaniumalloy.6.The specification, usage and property study of high-tech noble metal.

description.zh: 1. 數位通訊系統簡介2. 隨機程序3. 數位調變與多工技術4. 最佳接收器5. 載波與符碼同步6. 消息理論7. 訊源編碼8. 通道編碼9. 展頻通訊系統10. 行動通訊系統
description.en: 1. Introduction 2. Random Processes3. Digital Modulation and Multiplexing4. Optimal Receiver5. Carrier and Symbol Synchronization6. Information Theory7. Source Coding 8. Channel Coding9. Spread Spectrum Systems10. Mobile Communication Systems

description.zh: 寶石業為台灣新興的工業之一，集地質學、礦物學、結晶學、切割技術、商業行為及藝術美感於此門學問，寶石礦物的物理及化學性質和鑑定，寶石礦物的生成和產狀及其地理公布，如何加工，銷售行為如何進行，珠寶的設計方式及製造。寶石礦物之顏色分類，內含物之特色，光學現象之表現。人造寶石之製造與辨認，均讓學習者有能力鑑定其真偽，價值與市場行為。
description.en: Introduction the physics and chemistry properties of gemstones.

description.zh: 本課程為研究所熱流科學基礎課程之一，內容主要包括質量、動量與能量守恆方程式的推導，以及它們的解析與近似解，應用範圍包含非旋轉流、低雷諾數流以及高雷諾數(邊界層)流等等。
description.en: This course is one of the fundamental courses in the thermofluid sciences for graduate students. Based upon the concept of conservation, the equations of mass, momentum, and energy will be derived. This course will deal with solutions of these equations, both exact and approximate. The application of solutions includes irrotational flow, low Reynolds number flow, and high Reynolds number (boundary layer) flow, etc.

description.zh: 本課程在討論金屬.陶瓷與高分子性質與應用在整形外科和牙醫界。課程內容包括生醫材料之發展,牙醫材料之應用,複合材料在生醫工程之應用,生醫陶瓷,生醫材料之腐蝕機制以及生醫材料之工程問題。
description.en: The topics of this course include the properties of metallic, ceramic and polymeric materials, and their applications in the orthopedic and dental fields. The course contains the development of biomaterials, the application of materials for dentistry and dental surgery, composite materials in biomedical engineering, bioceramics, corrosion mechanisms of metallic biomaterials and engineering problems associated with materials.

description.zh: 字彙, 文法, 閱讀, 解讀。
description.en: Vocabulary, grammar, reading, decipherment.

description.zh: 先修課程:負責教授同意材料一般性質之介紹，化學對材料性質的影響，原子在晶體內的堆積方式及X 光繞射，固體內原子排列的不規則性和原子擴散，固體傳導電子的特性，凝固的各種物理性質，相金屬和有關的各種機械性質，鋼鐵材料及其應用。
description.en: General Properties of Materials, Chemical Effects to Material Properties, Atomic Packing Types in Crystals and X-ray Diffraction, Imperfections of Atomic Arrangement in Solids and Atomic Diffusion, Conduction of Electrons in Solids, Solidification, Physical Properties, Metals and their echanical Properties, Ferrous Materials and their Applications.

description.zh: 本課程介紹各種常用之進階影像處理理論，課程內容含蓋：１. 空間域影像強化２. 頻域影像強化３. 影像還原４. 彩色影像處理５. 型態學影像處理６.影像分割 7. 物件辨認 8. 小波理論
description.en: This course contains the advanced topics in digital image compression. It includes １Image Enhancement in Spatial Domain ２. Image Enhancement in Frequency Domain ３. Image Restoration ４.Color Image Processing ５. Morphological Image Processing ６. Image Segmentation 7. Object Recognition 8. Wavelet and Multiresolution Processing

description.zh: 本門課程主要是介紹近代蛋白質生物技術的進展，內容包括原核與真核重組蛋白表現系統、蛋白質分離與純化、月生月太合成、醫療用蛋白、工業用酵素、抗體與疫苗的製造與應用。
description.en: This course will cover topics in prokaryotic and eukaryotic cell protein expression system, protein isolation and purification, peptide synthesis, therapeutic proteins, industrial enzymes, and production and application of antibodies and vaccines.

name.zh: 生物科技與工程論文探索
name.en: Frontiers in Interdisciplinary Bio-Technology and Engineerin

description.zh: 生物科技與工程論文探索是一門引導學生瞭解最新生物科技與工程發展。針對進入生物科技領域之初學者訓練論文資料收集、研讀整理、英文摘要之撰寫、及對專題表達能力之訓練。
description.en: This class will introduce students to current research topics in biotechnology and bioengineering. Students read current research papers, present the data, and learn to critique papers.

description.zh: 以科學方法探討聚合物特性，使學生了解分子結構與物性的關係、物性之測定方法及物性與加工應用上之關係。
description.en: The unique features of polymers are introduced.  Specialemphasis is given to the structuring effects of processingon polymer morphology and properties.

description.zh: 科技日文主要是以培養閱讀日文科技期刊或論文能力為重點，俾充實大學理工系、所學生參考日文系列技術論文或工程手冊時之理解、翻譯與書寫方式。課程內容包含：    1.論文閱讀練習    2.翻訣技巧    3.技術論文之書寫
description.en: This course will direct students to learn the ability of reading and writing Japanese journals, papers engineering instruction manuals or reference materials. This course include:1.  papers reading practice2.  translation skill3.  technical writing

description.zh: 專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論
description.en: Literature Study, Seminar, Group meeting.

description.zh: 低溫冷凍科學在高附加價值的生物科技與生物醫學具有不可言喻的重要性，低溫生物醫學技術在於藉由熱流科學的理論、方法和技術，探討低溫生物醫學的一些結構性問題、低溫生物醫學的熱分析、熱計算和熱試驗、最佳化熱控制方法、研製和改善低溫生物醫學中的儀器設備。本課程內容包含七個單元：（一）低溫生物醫學技術導論、（二）溶液的凍結特性與細胞的損傷、（三）水溶液的結晶與玻璃化、（四）生物體低溫保存技術與應用、（五）低溫技術在電子顯微鏡生物樣品製備中的應用、（六）低溫生物醫學技術的儀器和設備、（七）低溫外科工程。
description.en: The purpose of this course is to introduce the effects of low temperatures on all types of organisms and their constituent cells, tissues and organs. The contents include the range from natural mechanisms of cold tolerance, cryopreservation of cells for medical purpose, low temperature microscopy, cryosurgery, through to the physics and physical chemistry of water and ice, and heat and mass transfer in biological systems.

description.zh: 本課程將探討醫學工程在骨科醫學上應用之基礎原理、臨床操作以及未來的發展。包含的內容有:骨科醫學的基礎知識工程技術在骨科手術上之應用、骨科器械之種類及原理、骨科生醫材料之種類及特性、骨科生物力學、骨組織工程、軟骨再生、生物摩擦潤滑學等。
description.en: This course will introduce the applications of biomedical engineering techniques on orthopaedics. The topics of the course includes 1) Fundamentals of orthopaedics ; 2)Applications of engineering techniques on orthopaedics; 3) Principles and applications of orthopaedic medical devices; 4) Orthopaedic biomaterials; 5) Orthopaedic biomechanics; 6) Orthopaedic tissue engineering; 7)Cartilage regeneration; 8)Biotribology.

description.zh: 分子生物學主要藉由分子的方法來探討細胞的生成、組成、功能及相互間之作用。因此此課程會含概以下四大部分：1.	細胞之簡介2.	分子基因學3.	細胞之內部組成4.	細胞間之生長，交互作用之影響
description.en: Molecular Biology is chiefly concentrated with eucaryotic cells and its title reflects the prime importance of the insights that have come from the molecular approach. This course will cover the following four different parts.1.	Introduction to the cell2.	Molecular genetics3.	Internal organization of the cell4.	Cells in their social context

name.zh: 新聞英語及聽力訓練（一）

description.zh: 本課程利用新聞教材加強英語字彙能力及聽力技巧, 	內容採用電台、報紙、電視的時事、深度報導和全球議題以增強學生英語知識。同時, 學生亦可獲得各種有用的聽力技巧以加強英語聽力。
description.en: This course is designed to increase vocabulary power and develop listening skills in English through up-to-date news. Current events, in-depth reports as well as global issues from radio, newspapers and T.V are provided to enrich the student's English knowledge. Effective listening skills are reinforced to enhance the student's listening comprehension.

description.zh: 本課程旨在進一步加強學生的口語表達溝通之能力，經由合宜的活動設計，如小組討論與英語談話情境的塑造，如面談，學生將獲得充分機會以演練聽講的技巧。
description.en: This course is designed to develop oral communication skills at a higher level.  Stimulating themes and authentic content will be used to engage students and generate lively conversation, such as though-provoking newspaper, magazine articles, and video films. Activities include task-based pair and small-group discussion for maximum practice and personalization.

description.zh: 本課程旨在進一步加強學生的口語表達溝通之能力，經由合宜的活動設計，如小組討論與英語談話情境的塑造，如面談，學生將獲得充分機會以演練聽講的技巧。
description.en: This course is designed to develop oral communication skills at a higher level.  Stimulating themes and authentic content will be used to engage students and generate lively conversation, such as though-provoking newspaper, magazine articles, and video films. Activities include task-based pair and small-group discussion for maximum practice and personalization.

description.zh: 本課程旨在提昇學生撰寫結構完整段落和短文之能力, 並著重如何重寫、摘要、 轉述、 陳述、筆記、編排、起草、修改等相關技巧。
description.en: This course is expected to expand students' writing capacity and experience by helping them to formulate, organize, and present ideas clearly in well-formed paragraphs and compositions.  Students will learn about rewriting, outlining, paraphrasing, synthesizing, documenting, note-taking, writing the draft and editing their own work.

description.zh: 本課程旨在提昇學生撰寫結構完整段落和短文之能力, 並著重如何重寫、摘要、 轉述、 陳述、筆記、編排、起草、修改等相關技巧。
description.en: This course is expected to expand students' writing capacity and experience by helping them to formulate, organize, and present ideas clearly in well-formed paragraphs and compositions.  Students will learn about rewriting, outlining, paraphrasing, synthesizing, documenting, note-taking, writing the draft and editing their own work.

description.zh: 本課程旨在培養學生熟悉日常生活英語會話及以正常速度聽講之能力。課程內容取材自學生周遭所熟悉事務, 藉由媒體傳播素材來訓練學生經常聽講之能力，並在課堂中研討其內容以達到運用之目的。
description.en: This course is designed to familiarize students with daily spoken English as well as listening and speaking skills. The content includes a wide variety of authentic multimedia materials-printed audio and video texts.  This gives students an opportunity for both recognition of different speaking styles and an in-depth, culture-rich understanding of the topics from multiple perspectives. Real-life situations are rehearsed in the classroom, with role-plays, situational activities, excerpts from newspapers and magazines and interviews with real people. Speaking practices based on day-to-day language are emphasized in class.

description.zh: 本課程藉由不同情境之英語錄影帶, 以及專題的語彙題目來提供一個英語談話的情境使學生能學習合宜的詞句。小組討論、角色演練、口頭報告皆為主要教學技巧，俾能增強學生之聽說能力。
description.en: This course aims at providing an English-speaking environment to allow students learn about the speaking strategies and common expressions used in different situations through viewing video films and oral practice. Small-group/pair discussion and role-playing are also parts of the methodologies.

description.zh: 本課程藉由不同情境之英語錄影帶, 以及專題的語彙題目來提供一個英語談話的情境使學生能學習合宜的詞句。小組討論、角色演練、口頭報告皆為主要教學技巧，俾能增強學生之聽說能力。
description.en: This course aims at providing an English-speaking environment to allow students learn about the speaking strategies and common expressions used in different situations through viewing video films and oral practice. Small-group/pair discussion and role-playing are also parts of the methodologies.

description.zh: 本課程分為兩部分：（1）英文文法觀念的溫故知新，並引導學生將正確的文法觀念運用在閱讀與寫作上，學生可加強基本句型練習、句子改正及句型修正。相關討論包括直述句、引述句、句型變化與修飾;（2）英語修辭法：聽講溝通的有效原理原則。課堂討論主題包括：指稱、一致、倒裝等修辭觀念。修習本課後，學生對出現在相同邏輯意義語境中， 利用不同表達方式以凸顯各種語意的方式與內涵，當有更進一步的體認。
description.en: This course is divided into two parts: (a) The first part is designed for the students to  familiarize themselves with English grammatical framework in relation to reading and writing. A review of grammatical ideas at high level is reinforced by correcting sentence errors, and revising awkward usage of words or sentence structures. The main subjects include English sentence structures, verbal usages, conjunctions, and sequences. Related topics for class discussion cover direct and indirect speech, sentence transformation and modification of sentences; (b) The second half of the course focuses on English rhetoric--principles of effective written and spoken communication. Topics for class discussion include reference, coherence, reverse structures and some related rhetorical concepts. It is hoped that the students will know better the significance brought about by the variations of different expressions that occur in the similar linguistic contexts.

description.zh: 本課程精選有關教育與文化之文章，引導學生從閱讀中印證，比較各種文化和教育現象，並鼓勵學生從各種不同角度蒐集資料，俾使課堂討論呈現時代性與多元化的觀點。
description.en: This course is intended to help students develop their English proficiency through readings and discussions on discourses of education and culture.  Students are encouraged to react to the experiences described, relate them to their own lives and express their feelings and thoughts through interactive speaking activities.

description.zh: 本課程主要在培養各類型段落、短文的撰寫能力，包括描寫、敘述、說明及議論性質文章。
description.en: This course is intended for university-level EFL writing students with the aim of increasing their fluency in English writing. To achieve this goal, students in this course will have ample opportunities to write varying types of English paragraphs, for instance, paragraphs of definition and paragraphs focusing on cause and effect relationships. In addition, they will have plenty of opportunities to write various kinds of short English essays, including descriptions, narratives, and argumentative writings.

description.en: This course is designed to enable students to develop the principles and skills necessary for public speaking. Included will be guidelines for giving a speech and displaying body language, and practices for prepared speech and impromptu speech.

description.zh: 本課程介紹研究方法和論文寫作知識，期能培養學生獨立研究和撰寫學術報告、論文的基本能力。主要分為三部份：（一）研究內涵與步驟,（二）主要的研究方法,（三）如何撰寫英文論文及報告。涵蓋主題包括：運用圖書館資源選擇研究主題、研究計劃的撰寫、問卷調查法、訪問法、觀察法、田野工作研究方法、文獻資料分析法（內容分析法）、個案研究法、相關研究法、實驗法、文學研究法，研究報告論文格式與寫作要領，如何撰寫文獻探討，參考書目寫法等。
description.en: This course aims at providing students with the fundamental knowledge and competence that they will need in doing research and writing research papers.  Its main purpose is to familiarize students with methods, procedures, and techniques that are applicable to quantitative and qualitative research as well as to improve their ability to write research papers.  The main topics for instruction include: the research process; major research methods; and the structure of a research paper.  The research methods primarily studied include the experimental method, descriptive research, ethnography, case study, observation, survey research (questionnaire and interviews), content analysis/documentary analysis, and critical approaches to literature.

description.zh: 本課程主 要是對生醫玻璃處理技術在理論基礎，方法與應用等方面的講述，以期 培養學生的興趣與專業的知識。課程內容包括生醫玻璃技術的基本理論，處理技術，各種生醫玻璃的製造方法與相關知識，以及各種生醫玻璃技術的應用等項目。
description.en: Bio-glass in the system of Na2O- CaO-Sio2-P2O5 and related glasses are introduces initially in this course. The Bioactive glasses and Glass-ceramic in clinical uses are taught next. The following chapter is covered from bio-glasses and glass-ceramics bond to living bone through layer which is formed on their surfaces in the living body. Blass-ceramics for hyperthermia treatment of cancer and Glasses for radiotherapy of cancer is brief introduced in this course finally.

description.zh: 粉體之應用範圍廣泛，可以說涵蓋了所有的產業，然而粉體的問題卻是錯綜複雜的，因此對粉體科學與工程的了解是有必要的。本課程在一學期每週三小時的時間安排下主要講述的基本粉體學，內容包括粉粒體的定義，粉體的生成，粉體的特性與物性，粉體的分離、分級、混合、儲藏、輸送與設計等工程，粉體的工業安全與衛生等項目，以期學生能對粉體科學有基本上的認識。
description.en: he aim of the course is to provide participants with a broad understanding of the fundamentals of powder technology, with an emphasis on concepts and practical problems. These contents include (1) Characterization of single particle and powders, (2) Mixing and segregation of powders, (3) Fabrication of powders, (4) The storage and flow of powders, (5) Classification and separation of powders, (6) Size enlargement and reduction of powders, (7) Explosion and fire hazards of powders, (8) Health risks of fine powders, etc.

The recovery methods and the follow-up process to recycle the solid waste will also be discussed.  Several practical case study will be included.

description.zh: 本課程包括：1.陶瓷製程介紹，包括粉體製造、成形法、添加劑及燒結實務。2.材料基本概念，如陶瓷晶體結構、擴散、缺陷化學、固態反應等。3.結構陶瓷特性及檢測方法。4.電子陶瓷特性，包括介電性、鐵電性、半導性及檢測法。5.磁性材料特性及檢測。

name.zh: 類神經模糊控制及其應用
name.en: Neural Fuzzy Control and Its Applications

description.zh: 雖然類神經網路及模糊邏輯均可適當作為控制用，但前者具有容錯、平行處理及學習的特性，而後者具有語言描述及邏輯控制的特性，因此這兩者具有互補效果。若能將此二者妥善整合，將有助於解決複雜系統的控制問題。近年來如何充分利用類神經網路與模糊系統的好處（例如系統的強健性、資訊分散式表示法、容易處理不確定感測器數據等），並據此設計一控制系統，這方面的需求日益迫切。這門課在歐美先進國家很熱門，國內雖有一些大學，開始開授類神經網路，以及模糊系統的課程，但大都單獨開授，僅有少數將此二者予以整合。有鑑於此，乃選擇開授「類神經模糊控制及其應用」。授課對象以研究生為主，時間為一學期。本課程開授的目的為介紹類神經網路與模糊控制之基本理論、重要現象、分析方法與工具、及部份應用實例。另外也將介紹相關研究課題之發展、研究近況與待探討的問題。規劃的課程大綱如下：類神經網路簡介、前饋網路及監督式學習、非監督式學習網路、迴授型類神經網路、類神經網路之應用、模糊集合概念、模糊關係、模糊邏輯及近似推理、模糊邏輯控制系統及類神經模糊控制器。
description.en: Neural networks and fuzzy systems have demonstrated good characteristics, such as robustness, distributed knowledge representation, capable of handling uncertainties, etc. In this course, we shall introduce the basic theorems, important phenomena, analysis methods and tools, and some applications. Besides, we shall also introduce some recent development in research, new research topics, and some unsolved problems. The outline of this course is as follows. Introduction to Neural Networks, Feedforward networks and Supervised Learning, Unsupervised Learning Networks, Recurrent Neural Networks, Applications of Neural Networks, Concept of Fuzzy Sets, Fuzzy Relations, Fuzzy Logic and Approximate Reasoning, Fuzzy Logic Control and Neural Fuzzy Controllers.

description.zh: 本課程提供理工學者撰寫科技論文之英文寫作技巧與指導，內容包括：扼要複習英文文法，詳細說明撰寫英文研究報告或論文時常犯的錯誤，深入討論標準英文寫作風格與修辭原則，提供簡易而有效的實作原則以提昇科技論文的可讀性。
description.en: This course develops a curriculum providing students with an English writing skill and direction focused on technical essays, including the followings : 1. Concise review of English grammars2. Frequent writing mistakes of essays or reports3. Deep discussion concerning standard English writing style and rhetoric principles4. Offering simple and practical writing principles to increase the readability of technology essays.

description.en: In Taiwan, medical devices industry is the most glaring term	in all areas of biotechnology. In comparison with the other products, the medical devices should provide the higher requirement for safety and approve the qualification of medical laws. Six topics are introduced and discussed in this class: (1) definition of medical device, (2) introduction to market of medical devices, (3) research and design of medical devices, (4) safety evaluation of medical devices, (5) license certification of medical devices, and (6) several case studies.
